user_query: I'm a student conducting research on renewable energy sources and their impact on the environment. Can you provide me with data and statistics on the usage and adoption of renewable energy in different countries? Additionally, I would like to know if there are any government policies or incentives that promote renewable energy.

TaskList.description: Gather data and statistics on the usage and adoption of renewable energy in different countries.
Compile a list of government policies or incentives that promote renewable energy in various countries.
Analyze and summarize the data collected in steps 1 and 2 to identify trends and insights.
